name: Escape the Lava
description:
This is my first ever game and also first game jam game! The goal is to escape the lava level after level and get to the rainbow orb!  The theme was escape the room so we're going to pretend the orb gets you out of the room... it's my first game cut me some slack...

Arrows or WASD to move, space to jump, shift to run, and escape to close the game.
